com.viaoa.util

Class OAJsonReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.util.OAJsonReader

  • public class OAJsonReader
extends java.lang.Object
    OAJsonReader that converts to XML, and then uses OAXMLReader to convert to OAObjects and Hubs.
    Since:
    20120518
    Author:
    vvia
    See Also:
    OAJsonWriter

        Parses the JSON text and returns the root object(s).
        Parameters:
        rootClass - class for the root object. If it is a Hub, then it needs to be the OAObjectClass of the Hub.
